languages.text: "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. А что касается тебя, Вакемо... Мне нечего добавить. Твой план — полное дерьмо, и в такие азартные игры я не играю. Оставляю тебя подумать над своими перспективами и тем, не лучше ли воспользоваться мои шаттлом... пока он, как и я, еще здесь".

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."
languages.original_text: "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. А что касается тебя, Вакемо... Мне нечего добавить. Твой план — полное дерьмо, и в такие азартные игры я не играю. Оставляю тебя подумать над своими перспективами и тем, не лучше ли воспользоваться мои шаттлом... пока он, как и я, еще здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap and the kind of gamble I don't take. I'll leave you to think about your prospects and maybe realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while the shuttle and I are still here."

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap and the kind of gamble I don't take. I'll leave you to think about your prospects and maybe realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while the shuttle and I are still here."

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap and the kind of gamble I don't take. I'll leave you to think about your prospects and maybe realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while the shuttle and I are still here."

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap and the kind of gamble I don't take. I'll leave you to think about your prospects and maybe realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while the shuttle and I are still here."

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

languages.text: “你好啊，大人。至于你，弗拉魔……我已经没什么好说的了。你的计划完全就是扯淡，我可不打算赌命。我希望你也能好好想想接下来该怎么办。或许你会明白，乘坐我的穿梭机逃跑是个更好的主意……趁着我和我的穿梭机还没走。”
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

traits.locale_text: “你好啊，大人。至于你，弗拉魔……我已经没什么好说的了，你的计划完全就是扯淡。我可不打算赌命，我希望你也能好好想想接下来该怎么办。或许你会明白，乘坐我的穿梭机逃跑是个更好的主意……趁着我和我的穿梭机还没走。”

languages.text: 「どうも、陛下。それにヴァッケモ、あんたには…言う事はない。あんたのプランはくだらないし、そんな胡散臭いことに乗れないっての。これからのことを考えてみな。もしかしたら、私とシャトルがまだここに留まっている間に…私のシャトルを使う方がいいと気付けるかもね」
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、どうも。それに、ヴァッケモ…お前に言う事はない。お前の計画はガラクタで、ただのギャンブルにすぎない。そんなのに参加していられない。 私がシャトルと共にここにいる間に、私のシャトルを使う方が安全な提案だと気が付くかもしれない」

languages.text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Y en cuanto a usted, Vackemo... No tengo nada que añadir. Su plan es una mierda y no pienso jugármela con él. Dejaré que piense en sus posibilidades y quizás se de cuenta de que usar mi lanzadera sería mejor idea... mientras la lanzadera y yo sigamos aquí».
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Y en cuanto a usted, Vackemo... No tengo nada que añadir. Su plan es una mierda y el tipo de apuesta que no acepto. Dejaré que piense en sus posibilidades y quizás se de cuenta de que usar mi lanzadera sería mejor idea... mientras la lanzadera y yo sigamos aquí».

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Und was Euch angeht, Vackemo ... Ich habe nichts zu ergänzen. Euer Plan ist absoluter Dreck ... ich lasse mich nicht auf ein solches Risiko ein. Ich lasse Euch jetzt über Eure Perspektiven nachdenken. Vielleicht erkennt Ihr ja, dass es besser wäre, mein Shuttle zu nehmen ... solange das Shuttle und ich noch hier sind."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

traits.locale_text: "Seid gegrüßt, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Und was Euch angeht, Vackemo ... Ich habe nichts zu ergänzen. Euer Plan ist völlige Scheiße, auf so ein Risiko lasse ich mich nicht ein. Ich lasse Euch kurz über Eure Aussichten nachdenken, vielleicht erkennt Ihr ja, dass es eine bessere Idee wäre, mein Shuttle zu nehmen ... so lange das Shuttle und ich noch hier sind."

languages.text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Quant à vous, Vackemo... je n'ai rien à ajouter. Votre plan est bon à jeter, je refuse de prendre ce genre de risques. Je vous laisse y réfléchir, vous finirez peut-être par comprendre qu'il vaudrait mieux utiliser ma navette... avant que je m'en aille avec ladite navette. »
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. And as for you, Vackemo... I've got nothing to add. Your plan's utter crap — I don't gamble on those kinds of odds. I'll leave you to think about your prospects. Maybe you'll realise that using my shuttle would be a better idea... while me and my shuttle are still here."

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Quant à vous, Vackemo... Je n'ai rien à ajouter. Votre plan est bon à jeter, je refuse de prendre ce genre de risques. Je vous laisse y réfléchir, vous finirez peut-être par comprendre qu'il vaudrait mieux utiliser ma navette... avant que je m'en aille avec ladite navette. »
